article_title: Confused Cats Against Feminism Tumblr is the best response to Women Against Feminism
article_text:
Topics: Cats, confused cats, Feminism, Gender Equality, Misogyny, Patriarchy, Sexism, Social Media, Tumblr, women against feminism, Women's Rights, Life News, Entertainment News

There were some excellent responses to the befuddling Women Against Feminism Tumblr that gained attention earlier this week, but the best takedown by far is the parody Tumblr Confused Cats Against Feminism.

The Tumblr parodies statements made by anti-feminist women on the Tumblr, like “I don’t need feminism because I love masculine men like Christian Grey :-P” and “I don’t need feminism because I don’t think it’s necessary to belittle an entire gender in the name of equality” by using cats who seem to know next to nothing about feminism, as well:

article_metadata.description: This site is a much-needed parody
article_metadata.author: Prachi Gupta
